subject: Football
Super Bowl
Security and Warning Systems
lead_paragraph: Mike Murphy, who has escorted five Giants head coaches on and off the field since 1991, says the occasional splash of a Gatorade shower is one of the perks of being the team’s chief of security.
snippet: Mike Murphy, who has escorted five Giants head coaches on and off the field since 1991, says the occasional splash of a Gatorade shower is one of the perks of being the team’s chief of security.
